execution_plan.description: Get the distinct order_ids that have already been shipped.
Get invoice statuses for orders that are not in the shipped order list (i.e., unshipped orders). Matches invoices to orders by invoice_number = order_id.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, i.invoice_number, i.invoice_status_code FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Invoices i ON i.invoice_number = o.order_id WHERE o.order_id NOT IN ($step1.order_id);
